title: Understanding Psychotic Disorders
text: Psychotic disorders are a group of serious illnesses that affect the mind. They make it hard for someone to think clearly, make good judgments, respond emotionally, communicate effectively, understand reality, and behave appropriately.

title: Types of Psychotic Disorders
text: There are several types of psychotic disorders, each with its own set of symptoms and characteristics. Some are short-term, while others are long-lasting.
